scripts.start: npm run watch # Start ~= Start dev
scripts.build: rollup index.mjs --name fch --output.format umd | uglifyjs -o index.min.js
scripts.watch: nodemon --exec "npm run build && npm test && npm run gzip" --watch src --watch test --watch webpack.config.js --watch package.json
scripts.gzip: gzip -c index.min.js | wc -c && echo 'bytes' # Only for Unix
